author: YourName
name: Massmove
short: Move or swap members between voice channels
description: Commands to move multiple users between voice channels at once. Includes massmove (one-way transfer) and massxfer (two-way swap) between channels.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the Massmove cog! Use `[p]massmove` to move all members from one voice channel to another, or `[p]massxfer` to swap members between two voice channels.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
